S = input()  # str
S = int(input())  # int

def main():
    s = str(input())

    print(s.replace('s', 'x'))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    s = input()

    print(s.replace('s', 'z'))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
